Reviews.Title: “Excellent location with big comfy rooms”
Reviews.Author: janewdc
Reviews.Content: hotel 18 superbly located half block collins st airport bus stop 3 min walk washington st lincoln rd heart action south beach block half beach hotel provides short term stays corner huge kitchen equipped stove microwave dishes pots etc dining table fridge plenty storage space clothes bed comfortable ac bathroom tub toiletries hair dryer provided windows white panels beneath curtains helpful lot light entering mornings helps cooler clean wi fi included complaint hotel noise street kept waking night guess thats excellent location doesnt pool wasnt summary price clean excellent location

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, cheap, and close to the action (but not too close)”
Reviews.Author: exvine
Reviews.Content: husband stayed weekend february happy lady front desk nice helped bags hotel tiny studio apartment complete kitchen clean local bus stop block ride 25 cents lincoln road mall short walk south easy action hotel quiet actually sleep night south beach absolutely beautiful trip recommend hotel ok basic clean set pool hot tub breakfast breakfast hop bus 8th eat patio news breakfast fun people watching

Reviews.Title: “Ok stay - good location but noisy”
Reviews.Author: Icefloat
Reviews.Content: stayed 1bedroom apartment weekend february hotel reasonable prices apartment choice 3 adults travel apartment clean comfortable futon living comfy bathroom adequate kitchen basics location walking distance lincoln road collins ave etc minus comes noisy atmosphere lots people congregate outside patio outside makes sleeping difficult sleeping futon living hotel easily accessible airport bus parking spots outside recommend bring ear plugs

Reviews.Title: “Clean, friendly motel stay”
Reviews.Author: Rose M
Reviews.Content: loved found motel online sometimes worrisome arrive clean quaint located nicely clean decorated efficiency kitchen liked stay cruise booked return please happily miami

Reviews.Title: “friendly and tasteful hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cat M
Reviews.Content: reception staff friendly helpful looked stylishly decorated light airy courtyard palm trees looked lovely expecting reasonably priced hotel pleasantly surprised lovely walking distance visit south beach definitely stay hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel 18
HotelInfo.Address: 230 18th Street, Miami, FL 33139
